youtube.title: How Braces Use Anchors to Align Teeth | Orthodontic TADs Explained
youtube.description: Ever wondered how braces manage to pull teeth into the perfect position? This video explains the role of Temporary Anchorage Devices (TADs) in orthodontics. Learn how these tiny implants provide a fixed point to move teeth efficiently and improve your smile. #orthodontics #dental #biology
